channel.title: Process For Reporting Issues Post Steam Release
channel.description: There was earlier mention that continuing to use the Atlassian Bitbucket website wasn't the best means in reporting/tracking game issues/problems, and that a more detailed newly developed in-house reporting system was being considered, designed and implemented. What mechanism is being put in place to address game issues/problems that users encounter once the BMS free/non-free Steam versions are released?

item.title: Process For Reporting Issues Post Steam Release
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
Cpl.1nsane:

It’ll most likely be a different bug tracker (hosted by us) moving forward for the steam release with the ability to report for either the steam for the 2013 SDK release.

Would you like to correct your reply, Dr. McCoy?

Read full topic
item.source: Process For Reporting Issues Post Steam Release
